artist: Artist: Utagawa Kunisada; Publisher: Published by Sanoya Kihei
creditline: Gift of Mrs. Elaine C. Norden  in memory of her sister, Miss Esther M. Cleveland
inscription: Motoyoshi\'s poem and the background explanation of the poem: {Wabi nu reba / Ima hata onaji / Naniwa naru / Mi wo tsukushi te mo / Awan to zo omou} (Now, in dire distress / It is all the same to me / So then, let us meet / even though it costs my life / In Naniwa bay)
markings: red artist\'s toshidama seal | censor seal: {Tanaka} | publisher\'s seal: {Sanoki}
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
title: No. 20 Prince Motoyoshi
